summary: wig... so it really looks like Cyrus will possibly mention TJ/his crush gets revealed/implied in some way the very first...
body: wig… so it really looks like Cyrus will possibly mention TJ/his crush gets revealed/implied in some way the very first episode… that interviewer said she shipped Tyrus in the same breath as she said she watched the first episode and now they revealed there will be some sort of a revelation some people could be mad about? AND then Josh was messing with us right after maybe because we will know what happens between TJ and Cyrus sooner than we anticipated so he’s trying to scare us last minute with the goal being blindsiding us COMPLETELY so we’re gonna be shaking in our boots on Monday? I have no idea if we sound completely crackt out of our minds or we’re onto Josh but at the end of the day time is the ultimate truth teller

summary:
Who’s your favorite character?
As much as i absolutely love Buffy and Cyrus, i would have to say my favorite character is TJ! I...
body:
Day 5 of 31 Days of Andi Mack

Who’s your favorite character?

As much as i absolutely love Buffy and Cyrus, i would have to say my favorite character is TJ! I want to make it clear and get it out of the way now that he isn’t my favorite character just because he is half of tyrus.

Having a character that shows not everyone is “perfect” and that it’s ok/normal! While also showing that people can change and mature for the better is super important!

( gif credit @lukemullen )

Buffy: Bitch they said I got to do it.


Cyrus: They know not to let a flop do it.


Buffy: Your entire existence flopped. Just like your entire relationship will flop.


Cyrus: We got to go drag Jonah but let us know your thoughts.

blog.name: tj-meets-cyrus
blog.title: Andi Mack
blog.description: Laura ☆ 22 ☆ side blog ☆ icon by @admirablyamber ☆ main: mystery-hack

summary: 31 days of Andi Mack Day 5: favorite character This is honestly one of the few shows where I genuinely like all of the...
body:
31 days of Andi Mack

Day 5: favorite character

This is honestly one of the few shows where I genuinely like all of the characters (except for Miranda and Morgan ofc). If I had to pick a favorite, I’d have to go with TJ Kippen.

I definitely have a favorite character type in general; that is, the grumpy jerk who is deep down a kind person, they just suck at showing it (usually due to insecurity or some other internal struggle). So yeah, that basically describes TJ to a tee. That’s also why Amber was my favorite throughout season 1, and still is one of my favorites. 

The thing is, I knew they were going to give TJ a redemption arc (since that’s what they did with Amber and it didn’t seem likely that they’d keep him a bully forever), but I had no clue that they were also going to make his character gay. It’s so refreshing to see another gay character on the show who isn’t just a carbon copy of Cyrus. TJ, like Cyrus, has his own unique likes & dislikes, strengths & weaknesses, and personality traits in addition to being gay. Being gay is neither character’s defining characteristic and I find that so important, especially for young audiences. 

Anyway, I’m sooo happy that they’re developing TJ’s character more and I’m looking forward to what happens with him in season 3.

then you gotta change the game

Anika | Andi Mack

main blog: thesouthernoracle

other sideblogs for: Stranger Things and Stephen King's It

summary:
Thoughts Before Andi Mack Season 3:
For the love of the lord will you guys just have faith in Terri for once? Assuming Disney is...
body:
Thoughts Before Andi Mack Season 3:

For the love of the lord will you guys just have faith in Terri for once? Assuming Disney is going to reject her storyline is honestly insulting. Do you really think she would work with them if they refused the progress she’s trying to make?

Assuming Cyrus will never have a storyline is underestimating the whole show. Assuming Disney is homophobic because Cyrus hasn’t said the word “gay” is naive. Confused 12 and 13 year olds don’t label themselves as that anyways! They often stick to vague statements like “I like boys/girls” or saying they like a specific person. Saying a specific sexuality out loud, a lot of the time, is very scary for someone that age. The way Cyrus’s story has played out is realistic. Terri knows what she’s doing.

If Disney didn’t like Cyrus’s storyline, they wouldn’t have approved it, and we wouldn’t have one of the most important characters of this generation.

Reminder that Disney tried to have the lesbian couple on Good Luck Charlie. The shows following cancellation wasn’t what the network wanted. It was the result of extreme backlash that endangered a child. They had no choice. And now they’re trying again. That is so important.

  • Andi Mack covers real life topics in a way understandable by everyone. It has made more strides than any other show before it, and it will continue to do so. I think it’s about time we appreciate that.

summary:
day five! favorite character?

buffy!!!!!!!! i literally love every single character on this show so much but buffy is...
body:
day five! favorite character?

buffy!!!!!!!! i literally love every single character on this show so much but buffy is definitely my favorite. she’s actually the character i knew the least about when going into the show, but she very quickly became my favorite. i love how she’s confident and cocky but is still an amazing friend who’s always there for andi and cyrus. i absolutely love that she’s hesitant to be emotional and that she has trouble confiding in people and getting vulnerable with them. she’s unapologetically herself and that’s incredible. she’s super relatable and important as a character and i love her will all of my heart

summary: i love this “if andi mack season three were a food” video bc like... what better way to capture the casts’ personalities? like...
body: i love this “if andi mack season three were a food” video bc like… what better way to capture the casts’ personalities? like we have josh here all thoughtful and oddly specific like “itd b a kiwi bc its got layers and people r gonna b mad about it,” peyton like “mexican food! because different flavors that work well together~” and sophia here with a really solid jellybean example. and then asher’s like “bowie is the hot sauce” and i love that take

reblog.comment: i love this “if andi mack season three were a food” video bc like… what better way to capture the casts’ personalities? like we have josh here all thoughtful and oddly specific like “itd b a kiwi bc its got layers and people r gonna b mad about it,” peyton like “mexican food! because different flavors that work well together~” and sophia here with a really solid jellybean example. and then asher’s like “bowie is the hot sauce” and i love that take
